Html:
Hi all,

I need Sql Parser in C# for detect if sql files are correct.

I need parser of INSERT,  UPDATE, DELETE statements, better is ORACLE, but dont mind sql server, mssql, standard sql.

any help ? please, any sample code for my issue ?

 where I can download Grammars for Irony ??

Thanks.

Currently all sample grammars come included with the Irony solution. There are even samples of code for these grammars.

Check the project 020.Irony.Samples in the Irony solution.
